resources.string: Demo application for the Parklink Mifare Classic Tool Library
The library can input a list of preset 12 character (6-byte) key strings which it will use to try to authenticate with the KeyA/KeyB settings on each sector of the Mifare Classic tags.

This application is an Android demo of the Mifare Classic Tool Library developed by Parklink. The application is written and developed by Maxie D. Schmidt (maxieds@gmail.com) -- https://github.com/maxieds.
"Found new tag with UID=%s.\nHold the tag in place so we can read its contents ...
"Not actively scanning or waiting to write blank tag:\nIgnoring tag with UID=%s."
